description: JEEP 1984 CJ7 RENEGADE, in top Driven Show condition finished in the beautiful Garnet Metallic Burgundy or deep factory red that is a great contrast with the ‘Renegade' logos, it is believed to be the original paint that is just fantastic, has proper side and hood striping, really great frame and underchassis, rear mounted spare with cover, the famous strong 4.0 liter 6 cylinder motor with the 2v carburetor and stock air induction system is freshly maintained, all fluids and fresh plugs, stock appearance and highly detailed, mated to the 4-speed transmission with the low gear shifter, these engines featured the strong torque of the 258 cubic-inch straight six, it used a 3.73 rear end gear to connect with the 4-wheel drive, this still has the rare original black Jeep soft bikini top with new plastic installed with the factory Jeep tags still attached, full padded roll bar, easy to open covered rear spare the bucket seated interior is like new, has front cross safety belts along with dual rear seat belts, has floor carpet and black floor mats, has beautiful Factory Sport Road wheels, restored argent steel with new chrome trim rings and chrome center locking hubs, virtually new B.F. Goodrich radial All-Terrain TA 31x10.50 R15 LT tires, since this has the original paint, the front chrome grill cover is just added to look good and protect the original paint, then additional hood black decal is added for a striking appearance and stop the glare from the sun, this package looks terrific with this factory Renegade package that is just striking, has power steering and dual line front disc brakes, the brakes have just been checked at Fraser Dante to stop great, all lights are working, a special show sign is included, these 1984 – 1986 Jeep renegades are some of the most collectible of the later model jeeps, and this one is really a great fun piece!  see www.fraserdante.com for further information and full inventory
1983 Jeep CJ7 Laredo.   Original (Unrestored) 4.2 liter, inline 6 cylinder engine with 5 speed manual transmission, power steering, power brakes and
Hard & Soft Top, Hard Doors.

I am the second owner of this piece of history.  The original owner used it for 3 months of each year.  There is no rust rot on the vehicle.  The original owner even siliconed the floor bolts to prevent moisture from creeping up into the carpet. The carpet and interior are in excellent shape.
As soon as it was in my possesion (March 2017) I had a professional thoroughly coat it with Corrosion Free Formula 3000.
See picture of the Jeep during the process.
I then had it re-coated again before I stored it for the winter (
2nd coat wasn't necessary however I want to preserve this piece of history the best way I know how

Like most CJ7's, the clock, centre lockable console and radio are not original.  The only other items that are not original are the leaf springs and shocks (your welcome).  For a better ride, the Jeep has greasable shackles that fit Jeep YJ leaf springs.  Before I had it shipped to me I had the local 4Wheel Parts store install a new 2.5”lift with Rubicon shocks and YJ leaf springs.  When it arrived I felt it was too high so I had new lower Bilstein shocks and new stock height YJ leaf springs installed.  The spare Rubicon shocks and leaf springs are included in the price. There are no miles on these shocks and leaf springs.  New brake lines installed when the Bilstein's were put on.
You can drive this Jeep with one finger on the wheel.  It drives straight.
The overall paint is great for the 35 year old gem.

I also came across a set of original CJ7 Wagon Wheels complete with centre caps and three spare caps (total seven centre caps).  These rims are currently on old tires.  These rims and centre caps are included in the price.
Four(4) 31”BF Goodrich All-Terrain T/A's with less than 4500 kms (2800 miles). The spare has zero km/miles.
Factory Hardtop with the Interior light still working.  The interior colour of the top is white and the exterior is black.
New BestTop SunRider soft top last summer.
Car Cover included.

I don't need help selling this on consignment. I'm not in a hurry to sell.  Serious enquiries only.  Please have your wife's blessing before you contact me. Reason for selling, my wife wants something more sporty like an old Porsche to cruise in on the weekends.
Thanks,
Todd

Do you ever want to go explore the road less traveled?   Head down a dirt road out in the woods, or explore the outer reaches of a park system?  Then this CJ7 might be the vehicle you need.  It can take you to work during the week, and take you as far away from it as possible on the weekend.

You probably noticed from the picture, that this Jeep sits a little higher than usual. Some would say that is how a Jeep is supposed to sit.  That look is all a result of the upgrade to Dick Cepek wheels and Wild Country tires.  Looks great, doesn't it?  The look gets even better with the heavy duty black front bumper with tow hooks, and a chrome grill which stands tall and adds a splash of flash to the front.  Tri-tone blue striping goes great with the silver paint, dressing up the hood, spilling over the fenders and running down the rockers.  The rear bumper is also heavy duty, with tow hooks, and a receiver in case you want to trailer an extra toy of some sort with you.  The soft top is in good condition when you want to keep the weather out, but of course, you can drop that down and remove the doors for fun in the sun, on or off road.

Climb inside and you will find Jeep simplicity at its best.  You can see everything around you if you are in traffic, and that beefy Grant GT steering wheel feels good in your hands.  There are shifters for the manual transmission, and 4WD in the floor.  The dash is simple with a little button for the horn, and pull knobs for lights, wipers, heat, defrost and fan.  The tach is directly in front of the driver with the speedo, fuel (which also means this was real Renegade), and temperature gauges off toward the center.  An aftermarket radio/CD player provides the tunes, and your passenger gets a grab handle to hang on to at need.  Between the front buckets is a nice big, lockable, center console with lots of places to stash things and cup holders for everyone.  The roll bar is padded so you won't bump your head climbing in, or bumping around off road.  There is some storage room behind the back seat perfect for a cooler that can be accessed from inside, or by dropping the tailgate.

Pop the hood, (as long as you don't have the windshield folded forward onto it), and you will find the tried and true 4.2 Liter 6-cylinder engine.  This motor runs like a top!  Everything looks clean and there are signs of regular maintenance evident with a fresh-looking battery and tune up items like cap, wires and plugs.  Power steering is a nice feature with those bigger tires, and an Edelbrock air filter housing makes it easy to change the element.  A 4-speed transmission gets the power distributed, of course with the option of high or low range through the transfer case, and there are nice skid plates protecting the oil pan, transmission and fuel tank from damage.  But those things are already off the ground a bit thanks to the 33X12.50R15 tires on those Dick Cepek wheels, so go ahead, play rough if you want to.
Come on down and see if this is the vehicle you have been looking for to get you around town in style, or to help you achieve escape velocity.

1979 Jeep CJ7 Renegade with a fresh restoration. This is not just a paint job, it was full tub off restoration with a compete rebuild of the engine and transmission. It has a upgraded Mallory ignition, Edelbrock manifold and carburetor with electronic choke for a easy start up. Headers, Power steering, Front DISC brakes, Aftermarket cooling fans behind the radiator, this Jeep not only looks the part it drives out and performs as good as it looks. Repainted in it's original factory color of Morocco Buff with the correct Renegade stickers. Fresh BFG All Terrian tires mounted on Eagle Alloys. New soft top with full doors - No Hard Top. Pictured with soft top on and off. The interior has all new upholstery and carpet and you have to love the tilt wheel. This Jeep is stunning and will turn heads any where you go. Contact Shep at 208.721.1973

For sale in our Scottsdale Arizona showroom is a beautiful 1981 Jeep CJ7! This Jeep has a clean Blue Metallic exterior with a painted grey Hardtop and dark grey Nylon-Fabric interior. This 4x4 CJ has a new Crate Inline 6 Cylinder Engine with a 4-Speed manual transmission!  The interior has new seats carpet and Jeep Rubber floor mats.  There is also a handy mag-lite flashlight and holder on the left side of the driver"??s seat.  You will be 4-wheeling in style listening to your favorite tunes on a Pioneer Stereo System with Custom American Flag Rear Speaker Boxes!  This Jeep is also equipped with a Super Winch to help you out in a jam.  There is also a Hi-Lift Jack mounted on the hood so you can off-road with confidence.  Own or Rent an RV?  Then you will have no problem bring this little Jeep along as it is equipped with a High-Quality Towing Bar on the front.  The Goodyear Wrangler tires are in great shape.  You can also light your way on the trails at night with HID Headlights and Duel RUN-D Cube LED Lights!
